item.title: Munis Rise as Bonds Rally on Job Data Cementing Rate-Cut Bets

review.headline_rewrite: Munis Rise as Bonds Rally on Job Data Cementing Rate-Cut Bets
bullets: Yields on top-rated state and local government debt fell alongside those on Treasuries.
The weaker-than-expected data cemented bets the Fed will cut resume easing monetary policy this month, ending a pause that’s kept its benchmark overnight rate
“Investors are looking to lock in the relatively higher yields ahead of the policy easing.” Investors now see a quarter-point rate cut at the
16-17 policy gathering as a sure thing and anticipate a total of three such cuts this year, according to futures contracts.

item.title: Cattle futures dip on profit-taking, lower beef prices

review.headline_rewrite: Cattle futures dip on profit-taking, lower beef prices
bullets: By Karl Plume CHICAGO, Sept 5 (Reuters) - Chicago Mercantile Exchange cattle futures fell for a fourth straight session on Friday on profit taking
Lower beef prices and expectations for seasonally slowing demand at the end of the summer outdoor grilling season further fueled the break, although losses
Feeder cattle followed, with the October contract ending down 1.050 cents at 357.900 cents per pound.
CME lean hog futures firmed for a second consecutive day on Friday and for the ninth time in 10 sessions, supported by the discount
